entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
